definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Becoming a winning poker player means knowing when to quit.
sentences.chinese: 成为扑克中的赢家意味着你知道何时收手。

sentences.english: The person that ends up a winner,is the one who resolves to win.
sentences.chinese: 最终的赢家就是下定决心要赢的那个人。

sentences.english: The winner of the ebook sweepstakes will be the booksellerwho becomes a bookrenter.
sentences.chinese: 独得电子图书赌金的赢家将是做图书出租生意的书商。

sentences.english: In the downdraft from a commodity sell-off, the dollar would be the perverse winner.
sentences.chinese: 随着商品证券跌价，美元将会成为胜之不武的赢家。

sentences.english: Why is bcrypt such a huge win?
sentences.chinese: 为什么bcrypt是这么大的赢家？

sentences.english: Humiliated England loses out again, refuses to congratulate Russia.
sentences.chinese: 英国申办世界杯失利给赢家俄罗斯冷脸。

sentences.english: The goal, one said, is to avoid picking winners.
sentences.chinese: 其中一人说，目标就是避免去挑选赢家。

sentences.english: We all want to be winners.
The nation soon realized that Katrina had won on both 3)counts.
sentences.chinese: 美国很快就了解卡崔娜飓风在这两方面都是赢家。

sentences.english: MEC was the winner of not-for-profit sector category.
sentences.chinese: MEC是管理奖项中的非营利机构奖的赢家。

sentences.english: Acquirers will also have to get better at picking winners.
sentences.chinese: 收购家也必须改进自己挑选赢家的本领。

sentences.english: It's why the great winner - and it's a pity - is Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么大赢家是勒庞，这是令人遗憾的。

sentences.english: Whoever manages to collect all the pucks wins.
sentences.chinese: 谁能收集所有的pucks就是赢家。

sentences.english: It's why the great winner - and it's a pity - is Mrs. Le Pen.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么大赢家是勒庞，这是令人遗憾的。

sentences.english: When you do this, everybody wins.
sentences.chinese: 当你这样做时，人人都是赢家。

sentences.english: This state of affairs has many of the attributes of a no-win situation.
sentences.chinese: 这些矛盾最终可能是没有赢家的局面。

definition: to play yabao (a gambling game)/(fig.) to gamble on/to take one's chance/to try one's luck
